Abstract class that describes a datatset for medical image segmentation

load_msegm(patient_id) → <built-in function array>[source]¶

Load the multimodal ground truth segmentation

Parameters:patient_id (str) – the object’s identifier
Returns:segmentation – the ground truth segmentation as a bool tensor. Each channel must correspond to a class.
Return type:bool tensor

Load the ground truth segmentation

Parameters:patient_id (str) – the object’s identifier
Returns:segmentation – the ground truth segmentation as an integer tensor. Each value must correspond to a class.
